name: Xperience (BlancoTLM, Gamepie, GabiGabou)
description:
Bienvenue dans ce jouet, dont le seul but est d'explorer un ordinateur rétro rempli de petites icones qui vont fusionner entre elles.

Welcome to this toy, where the only objective is to explore a retro computer filled with small icons that will merge.
English is not yet available.

Game Designer : Camille MENANA https://gamepie.itch.io/
Game Art : Gabin AGGAR 
Sound Designer : Gabriel BOYARD https://itch.io/profile/gabigabou
Game Programmer : Garance LESPAGNOL
